Shadow
You can use this style element simply by adding a class to the appropriate block,for example: <div class="shadow-wraper"> <div class="da-shadow-1 shadow_style"></div> <div class="da-shadow-2 shadow_style"></div> <div class="da-shadow-3 shadow_style"></div> <div class="da-shadow-4 shadow_style"></div> <div class="da-shadow-5 shadow_style"></div> </div> Buttons

Flat Buttons

Raised Buttons

Flat buttons are typically used for less-pronounced actions. In cards, Flat buttonshelp maintain an emphasis on card content. Raised buttons are high-emphasis, distinguished by their use of elevation and fill. They contain actions that are primary to your app. The last example of this demo show how to use buttons: <h3>Flat Buttons</h3> <div class="button-wraper"> <button class="da-button button-style">Default</button> <button class="da-button da-flat-button_colored button-style">Colored</button> <button class="da-button da-flat-button_disabled button-style">Disabled</button> </div> <h3>Raised Buttons</h3> <div class="button-wraper"> <button class="da-button da-raised-button_default button-style">Default</button> <button class="da-button da-raised-button_colored button-style">Colored</button> <button class="da-button da-raised-button_disabled button-style">Disabled</button> </div> Cards Cards are surfaces that display content and actions on a single topic.They should be easy to scan for relevant and actionable information. Elements, like text and images, should be placed on them in a way that clearly indicates hierarchy. Although cards can support multiple actions, UI controls, and an overflow menu, use restraint and remember that cards are entry points to more complex and detailed information.

Cards are a convenient means of displaying content composed of different types of objects.

Card headline title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, doming noster at quo, nostrud lucilius rationibus ea duo. Vim no mucius dolores.No bonorum voluptatum vis, has iudicabit consectetuer ne. Nullam sensibus vim id, et quo graeci perpetua.

Card with image header

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, doming noster at quo, nostrud lucilius rationibus ea duo. Vim no mucius dolores.No bonorum voluptatum vis, has iudicabit consectetuer ne. Nullam sensibus vim id, et quo graeci perpetua.

For the creation of the above examples of cards, you can use the classes of thelibrary, which are given in the code below: <div class="da-card card-style"> <div class="da-card__text"> <p>Cards are a convenient means of displaying content composed of different types of objects.</p> </div> <div class="da-card__button"> <button class="da-button card-style__button">Hurray!</button> </div> </div> <div class="da-card card-style"> <div class="da-card__title">Card headline title</div> <div class="da-card__text"> <p> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, doming noster at quo, nostrud lucilius rationibus ea duo. Vim no mucius dolores.No bonorum voluptatum vis, has iudicabit consectetuer ne. Nullam sensibus vim id, et quo graeci perpetua.</p> </div> <hr class="da-card__line"> <div class="da-card__button"> <button class="da-button card-style__button">More info...</button> <button class="da-button card-style__button card-style__button_indent">Decline</button> <button class="da-button da-flat-button_colored card-style__button">Accept</button> </div> </div> <div class="da-card card-style"> <div class="da-card__header card-style__header"><img class="da-card__image" src="images/card_picture.png" alt=""> <div class="da-card__title da-card__image-title card-style__image-title">Card with image header</div> </div> <div class="da-card__text"> <p> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, doming noster at quo, nostrud lucilius rationibus ea duo. Vim no mucius dolores.No bonorum voluptatum vis, has iudicabit consectetuer ne. Nullam sensibus vim id, et quo graeci perpetua.</p> </div> <hr class="da-card__line"> <div class="da-card__button"> <button class="da-button card-style__button">More info...</button> <button class="da-button card-style__button card-style__button_indent">Decline</button> <button class="da-button da-flat-button_colored card-style__button">Accept</button> </div> </div>
